data.title: Dew Jirawat and Prim Chanikarn’s A Love So Beautiful Trailer & Release Date Revealed
data.meta_description: Popular Thai actors Dew Jirawat Sutivanichsak and Prim Chanikarn Tangkabodee are all set to lead the upcoming drama A Love So Beautiful, the Thai adaptation of the popular web novel of the same name. Previously, both actors were part of the cast of the Thai drama F4 Thailand: Boys Over Flowers. A Love So Beautiful […] The post Dew Jirawat and Prim Chanikarn’s A Love So Beautiful Trailer & Release Date Revealed appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
data.text:
Popular Thai actors Dew Jirawat Sutivanichsak and Prim Chanikarn Tangkabodee are all set to lead the upcoming drama A Love So Beautiful, the Thai adaptation of the popular web novel of the same name. Previously, both actors were part of the cast of the Thai drama F4 Thailand: Boys Over Flowers. A Love So Beautiful Thailand was first unveiled back in 2022. The drama is finally gearing up to make its way to screens after a long wait.

A Love So Beautiful’s storyline follows childhood friends and neighbors, Chadjen (Dew) and Som-O (Prim). When Chadjen’s mother relocates to another country, he begins living with Som-O’s family. The pair’s friendship transforms into something more as they grow up together. Chadjen and Som-O walk the journey from first love to a real relationship. Just like any other relationship, theirs too is packed with several hurdles as they navigate the intricacies of young romance.

Check out the trailer for A Love So Beautiful’s Thai version below:

A Love So Beautiful Thailand: Release date, cast & everything you need to know

Prim Chanikarn and Dew Jirawat’s A Love So Beautiful will release its premiere episode on Monday, June 3, 2024, at 8:30 p.m. ICT on GMM25. Alternatively, it will also be available to stream on VIU at 10:30 p.m. ICT. The drama will air every week on Monday and Tuesday at the aforementioned times.

Here are the release times of A Love So Beautiful premiere in various regions:

Monday, June 3, 2024, 7 p.m. IST

Monday, June 3, 2024, 10:30 p.m. KST

Monday, June 3, 2024, 9:30 a.m. ET

Monday, June 3, 2024, 6:30 a.m. PT

Monday, June 3, 2024, 1:30 p.m. GMT

Aside from Dew and Prim, the rest of the cast of A Love So Beautiful Thailand includes Neo Trai Nimtawat as Tao, Emma Panisara Yang as Khao, and Pentor Jeerapat Pimanprom as New.

Additionally, fans can check out the C-drama and K-drama versions of A Love So Beautiful on Netflix.
